Posts.Content: Chicken785 wrote: I have noticed in the last two weeks a couple of rather large lumps in my left breast, there is some pain accociated with them. The nipple hurts all the time, and the lumps are painful only if I press on them.Â  My Doctor has scheduled a Mammogram, but it's still 3 weeks away. I did have a Fibroadenoma removed from my right breast 10 years ago but this feels nothing like that. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpy and very worried. Chicken785 thefuzzylemon
